Tab1Text1:
1. Treat others with respect.
   2. Respect the server and its environment.
   3. Most importantly, have fun!

While rule violations can vary in severity, intentional harmful behavior is not allowed. This is not a reason to exploit or misuse the server (see Rule 2). Gentlemans agreements are encouraged and will be supported within reason (see Rule 1). We also encourage everyone to enjoy the full Omega experience. While there are no strict rules against tier skipping, remember that the journey itself is a big part of the fun (see Rule 3).
Tab2Text1:
We are a rapidly growing community dedicated to bringing you the ultimate Ark Omega experience. Join us for exciting events like soul runs, competitions, breeding challenges, and more!

Our team is highly active and committed to ensuring every player has a fantastic experience. Got suggestions or feedback? Wed love to hear from you! Share your thoughts in the suggestions channel on Discord, and help us make the server even better!
Tab2Text2: Welcome to our Ark server cluster, featuring the Omega mod. This mod creates an incredibly deep and immersive experience that adds RPG-like elements to the Ark universe.Whether youre new to the mod or just looking to advance, our friendly and helpful community is here to support you every step of the way. Dont hesitate to ask for tips or advice! Plus, stay tuned for our upcoming progression guide, which will soon be available on our website through the link below. Dive in and explore the adventure!
Tab3Text1:
We will be updating this with more commands over time, but for now the commands are as follows:

F1: Ark Omega menu
F2: EasyGoinGaming Shop
F5: Information
